text: niyata vasayenma kavurun apage ayavan boru kara eva pratiksepa kirima adambarakamak vasayen gattoda, ovunta (deviyange varaprasadayanta himi) ahashi edaratu vivara karanu nolæbe. indikatuve sidura tulin otuveku rimgana turu ovun svargaya at kara ganne næta. væradikaruvanta me andamatama api phalavipaka dennemu
